tables.name: franchise
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE franchise(franchiseid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT)

tables.name: aliases
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE aliases (aliasid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, node INT NOT NULL, tablename TEXT NOT NULL, alias TEXT NOT NULL,official BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0, language TEXT, UNIQUE(node,tablename,alias,language) ON CONFLICT IGNORE, UNIQUE(node,tablename,official,language))

tables.name: genres
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE genres (genreid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,abbreviation TEXT UNIQUE,heavy BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,spoiler BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0)

tables.name: genrelist
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE genrelist (genrelistid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,node INT NOT NULL, tablename TEXT NOT NULL, genre INT NOT NULL REFERENCES genres(genreid),UNIQUE(node,tablename,genre) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)

tables.name: yearseason
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE yearseason (yearseasonid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, season TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE)

tables.name: company
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE company (companyid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, company TEXT NOT NULL, role TEXT NOT NULL)

tables.name: links
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE links (linkid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, node INT NOT NULL, tablename TEXT NOT NULL, url TEXT NOT NULL, identification TEXT, UNIQUE(node,tablename,url) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)

tables.name: images
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE images (imagesid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, node INT NOT NULL, tablename TEXT NOT NULL, url TEXT NOT NULL, imagetype TEXT, UNIQUE(node,tablename,url) ON CONFLICT IGNORE)
